Package gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.Transparency

Interface Summary
IAxisAddible This interface is implemented by view components that utilize the AxisOverlay2D for displaying axis calibrations.
ILegendAddible This interface is implemented by view components that utilize the LegendOverlay.
ILogAxisAddible This interface is implemented by components that utilize the the AxisOverlay with logarithmic calibrations.
IMarkerAddible This interface is used to outline minimal methods needed for using the MarkerOverlay.
IOverlay This interface lays out methods to be implemented by all view component overlays.
IOverlayAddible This interface provides the most basic functions required by all overlays.
IPseudoLogAxisAddible This interface is implemented by components that utilize the the AxisOverlay with logarithmic calibrations that contain zero.
ITruLogAxisAddible This interface is implemented by components that utilize the the AxisOverlay with true logarithmic calibrations, that which do not contain values less than or equal to zero.
IZoomAddible This interface is implemented by view components that utilize overlays which respond to zooming.
IZoomTextAddible This interface is implemented by view components that utilize overlays which respond to zooming and display text.
 

Class Summary
AnnotationOverlay This class allows a user to write comments near a region on the IZoomTextAddible component.
AxisOverlay2D This class is used by view components to calibrate a JPanel.
CalibrationUtil This class bundles calibration functions together.
LegendOverlay This class is used by view components to add a legend to a graph.
Marker This class is a datastructure for grouping together all of the information necessary for making a marker.
MarkerOverlay This class allows a user to place markers near a region on a view component.
Note This class creates a datastructure to easily group together a String annotation, its location to be displayed, and the bounds it was created in.
OverlayJPanel  
SelectionOverlay This class allows users to select a region for calculation purposes.
TranslationOverlay This overlay is not like the Axis, Annotation, or Selection Overlays.
